org.kepler.dataproxy.metadata.ADN

Class ADNMetadataSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid.MetadataSpecificationInterface
      • org.kepler.dataproxy.metadata.ADN.ADNMetadataSpecification

  • public class ADNMetadataSpecification
extends MetadataSpecificationInterface
    This class is a plugin for adn namespace to transfer query group to ecogrid query type. It also provide a method to create quick search query
    Author:
    Efrat Jaeger-Frank

      • transformResultset

        public boolean transformResultset(org.ecoinformatics.ecogrid.queryservice.resultset.ResultsetType results,
                                  java.lang.String endpoint,
                                  CompositeEntity container,
                                  java.util.Vector aResultList)
                           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  EcoGridException,
                                  NameDuplicationException,
                                  IllegalActionException
        This method will transfer ResultsetType java object to array of ResultRecord java object. The ResultRecord object can be shown in kepler. If the results is null or there is no record in the result, null will be return
        Parameters:
        ResultsetType - results the result need to be transform
        String - endpoints the search end point
        Returns:
        ResultRecord[] the resultrecord need be returned.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        EcoGridException
        NameDuplicationException
        IllegalActionException
